detail_desc: Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication at the top and short sleeves with flounced trims. Flounce at the top and hem and a visible zip at the back.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication at the top and short sleeves with flounced trims. Flounce at the top and hem and a visible zip at the back.
Fitted dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck at the front and short, gathered puff sleeves. Seam at the waist, a gently flared skirt and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.

Blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with flared cuffs and sewn-on ties. Seam at the waist and a flare to the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
V-neck blouse in a stripe-print viscose weave with a diagonal, gathered seam at the front and drawstrings with ties at the sides. Long sleeves with pleats and a concealed zip at the cuffs.
Knee-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt with decorative frills. Unlined.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a pleat front, tie belt and zip fly with a concealed button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Long-sleeved dress in an airy weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with pleats and an asymmetric skirt. Unlined.
Straight-cut dress in a soft, patterned weave with a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Gently flared skirt with a seam and asymmetric flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Stud earrings in various colours and materials.
Flower-shaped earrings in thin metal wire. Diameter 4 cm.
Flower-shaped earrings in thin metal wire. Diameter 4 cm.
Glasses with plastic and metal frames and clear lenses.
Wide, V-neck blouse in a patterned viscose weave with long sleeves with ties at the ends. Gently rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Wide, V-neck blouse in a patterned viscose weave with long sleeves with ties at the ends. Gently rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Wide, V-neck blouse in a patterned viscose weave with long sleeves with ties at the ends. Gently rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a v-neck, buttons down the front and elbow patches in a contrasting colour.
Shaping briefs in lace and sturdy microfibre with a high waist, laser-cut edges and a lined gusset. The briefs have a sculpting effect that holds in and shapes the waist.
Shaping briefs in lace and sturdy microfibre with a high waist, laser-cut edges and a lined gusset. The briefs have a sculpting effect that holds in and shapes the waist.

Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a lined drawstring hood. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.

Cotton jersey top with short double frills in woven fabric around the armholes.

Calf-length skirt in imitation leather with a fake front pocket and diagonal zip. Detachable belt with a metal buckle and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Unlined.
Leather shoulder bag with a large metal fastener on the flap, metal chain shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size7x23x26.5 cm.
Straight-cut dress in woven fabric containing glittery threads with an opening and button at the back of the neck, heavily padded shoulders and long sleeves.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in nepped cotton poplin with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fully lined bathing suit with narrow shoulder straps that lace up and tie at the base of the back.
Double-breasted coat in a woven wool blend with large notch lapels, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Non-wired, push-up halterneck bra in microfibre with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Fastening at the back of the neck with an adjustable tie and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit over the hips and thighs and skinny fit over the calves. Regular waist, button fly and slightly shorter legs.

Jumpsuit in a soft viscose weave with a sheen. Wrapover top, seam at the waist with decorative pleats at the front and a sewn-in tie belt, and long sleeves with a high slit at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, side pockets and straight, wide legs with pleats at the top. Lined at the top.
Shirt in airy pima cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and an asymmetric hem at the front.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Top in soft, pima cotton jersey with a boat neck and long sleeves.
Top in soft, pima cotton jersey with a boat neck and long sleeves.

Top in soft, pima cotton jersey with a boat neck and long sleeves.

V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon with a flounce at the top and long sleeves with narrow lace cuffs with a button. Concealed zip in the side and a seam at the waist with an inset lace trim and gently flared skirt in two layers of different lengths. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with buttons at the back of the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved, calf-length dress in mesh with sequins and embroidered text. Opening and button at the back of the neck, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Short jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and visible flatlock seams.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and visible flatlock seams.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with studs sewn on by hand. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high, foldover waist and detachable twill belt with a metal buckle. Zip fly with a press-stud, and front and back pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch, coated twill with visible metal press-studs at the front and tapered legs with seams front and back and a zip at the hems.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative studs and openings at the knees.
Calf-length, ribbed jersey dress with a V-neck, press-studs at the top, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with long sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Skirt in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and pleats at the sides.
Leggings in soft, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative seams on the legs.
Short jersey T-shirt dress in a soft modal blend with studs at the neckline and sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short jersey T-shirt dress in a soft modal blend with studs at the neckline and sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short jersey T-shirt dress in a soft modal blend with studs at the neckline and sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jersey leggings in a sturdy cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at the top, front and back.
Sleeveless top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at the top, front and back.

Short-sleeved, patterned dress in sheer mesh with appliqués, a rounded collar at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the next. Elasticated seam at the waist and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Partly lined.
